title: [Epic] Profile Showcase

labels.name: E:Desktop Features 0.16
labels.description: Various features needed in Desktop app overall for 0.16 release

milestone.description:
**1.  Fix bug and stabilise Communities and Messaging functionality**

**2.  Reduce size of community description metadata**
- better compressions, less duplication

**3. Use data sync layer (or other mechanism) to improve community description reliability**
- Every time a new user joins the community, the Control Node updates and signs the description.
- Random back off to stop it being too chatty 

**4. Continue work on profile showcase **



**--- Wallet Team ---**

1. Complete support for Community minted assets

2. Complete token visibility management screens

3. Continue working on WalletConnect support

4. Minor updates to Asset screens

5. Continue fixing bugs, making optimisations and keeping tech debt low

body:
# [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-13865&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)

## Bugs
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - General] Review existing drag/drop actions in Accounts / Assets / Collectibles and Communities. It seems in the current app state these actions are broken.

## General

- [ ] [Profile Showcase - General] Break profile showcase page into tabs. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-13865&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
There are two main points:
    1. Each section of the current profile settings view needs to be moved into the corresponding tab. 
    2. The `Preview` tab becomes the `Preview` button
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - General] Clarify the side-by-side preview. There are two preview versions and it's not clear if one or both should be implemented. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=9-112784&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - General] Add Profile preview perspective options [Stranger, Contacts, Verified Contacts]. This includes the filtering of the data visibility based on the dropbox. Also review `Send Message` button logic [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=9-112784&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - General] Saving Profile Showcase changes triggers a toast message [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=104-97615&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - General] Add tooltip to the Save changes button specifying why itâ€™s invalid and disabled. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-145257&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0). Only Identity tab can have invalid changes, but the `Save button` can be disabled while the user is exploring another tab.

## Identity
- [ ] ~[Profile Showcase - Identity] Add `Use a collectible` context menu.~
Do not implement for now. The design is not ready

- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Identity] Update `Display name` error messages [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-145257&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)

## Assets

- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets&Collectibles] Update assets and collectibles delegate to include community badge when the token is a community one. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=315%3A158538&mode=design&t=Vhmjjhy5qjG1w5HW-1)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets] Add link to Accounts tab. The Assets selection available in the showcase is composed of all the assets owned by the visible accounts. This makes it clear that updating the visible accounts will also update the Assets selection available to showcase. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-160056&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets&Collectibles] Implement the `Intro popup` and show it on the first dirty state of Assets or Collectibles tab [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-177899&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets] Sort on drop/insert based on current balance [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-170380&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)

## Collectibles

- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles] Add link to Accounts tab [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-172408&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles&Assets] Explore whether the assets/collectibles filtering should happen on the backend or UI based on the accounts selected to showcase and/or Tokens management settings.
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles&Assets] Sync the drop area options with the visible accounts selection. E.g Account visible to Contacts only -> Assets and Collectibles from that account can only be dropped to Contacts and Verified. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-189089&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles&Assets] Sync the context menu with the visible accounts selection. Add tooltip and disable [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-31423&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
